      • convert

        public static OBJMesh convert(MeshData data,
              float tPosSq,
              float tUVSq,
              float tNormDot)
        Converts A Mesh Into OBJ Format Merging Data Within Tolerance Levels
        Parameters:
        data - Mesh
        tPosSq - Tolerance For Squared Distance Between Positions [0,Infinity)
        tUVSq - Tolerance For Squared Distance Between Texture Coordinates [0,1)
        tNormDot - Tolerance For Squared Distance Between Texture Coordinates [1,-1]
        Returns:
        An OBJ-Formatted Mesh
